answers.answer: My doc does one evry mnth

Typically no more than 5. If you're high risk,  you'll get more.  I was getting one every month until I hit 20 weeks. My anatomy scan was my last one. I have a 3d/4d one Friday but the doc is just doing that one for fun. To get the right answer,  just ask your doctor,  because every doctor and insurance is different. If I have gestational diabetes, I'll probably get another one.  Your doc will let you know,  but you most likely won't get another one after the anatomy scan,  unless the doctor sees a reason to give you one
I get them every visit i go to :) I Love it but I also go to a high risk doctor after getting pregnant on mirena and losing a baby
Oh ok. I already had a 4d ultrasound at 19 weeks, and my next appointment ill be 27 weeks so if I don't get one ill ask. Thank you :)
I get on every 2 weeks max 4 weeks ... I think it just depends on your doctor

You guys are lucky, I was only supposed to have one at 20 wks but I had to have a dating ultrasound done a month before. Unless I pay for one to be done out of pocket or my doc has a reason for one to be done
In the uk we get 2 unless we are at high risk my last one was at 19w4d I am now 33w3d and have become high risk so I get one every week until I deliver
My case ot depends on your insurance i only had maybe a total of four or five threw out my whole pregnancy no 3d or 4d either didnt even get to see her face nothing
I go in at list once a month and every time I go I get an ultrasound but that's how the clinic works they do ultrasounds with every visit .. I say it depends where you go
I only got two :( one at 8 weeks and one at 19 weeks. I'm 39 weeks now and can't see not daughter until she comes out since I have had a perfect pregnancy according to the doctor.
idk i live in canada and we have free health care bt we still only get two ultrasounds unless they feel theres something to watch out for.

question: How many ultrasounds do you get? I'm 25 weeks and the last one i had was at 19 weeks, when will i have another one? I enjoy them too much lol :)
title: ultrasounds?
